授業目的: Introducing the basic language functions and grammar needed at the elementary level, this course will train students to understand short conversations spoken in natural English and to use everyday expressions to interact and share information on themselves, their families, hobbies, school life, professions, travel and daily routines. Training will also be given in the communication strategies used by native speakers in listening and speech acts.
到達目標: To encourage maximum student participation, pair and group work will feature prominently in classroom activities, which will include role plays, surveys, songs and games. While building listening and oral skills, the course will also provide practice in elementary English writing patterns so that students are able to construct simple but effective messages.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lecture, Class participation, listening exercises, video lessons, interviews with the teacher. If in-person classes are not possible classes using Zoom or Google classroom will be used. Instructions will be given on LUNA Announcement board. Students are required to check LUNA prior to class for updates from the instructor.

第1回: Week 1 – Introduction of the class and ice breaking English activities
There is no textbook. Materials for the class will be provided.
第2回: Week 2 - Identity - The characteristics feelings or beliefs that distinguish you from others.
第3回: Week 3 – Identity part 2. Presentation on aspects that make us who we are.
第4回: Week 4 – Cross cultural understanding – We will explore differences between countries and find similarities and differences. Language, do’s and don’ts, culture.
第5回: Week 5 – Values – Values help us decide right and wrong and guide us through difficult choices. We will explore different core values of students in the class and look at how different people value different things.
第7回: Week 7 – Culture shock – We will use videos and explore students’ cross-cultural studies to learn about culture shock.
第8回: Week 8 – Paper test – We will have a short paper test on the first part of the class.
第9回: Week 9 – Culture and Language – We will be looking at how language and culture cannot be separated and reflect the culture of people who speak it. This is relevant between cultures and also age groups. We will be looking a lot at idioms.
第11回: Week 11 – Body and Language and Customs – We will do a lesson on nonverbal communication. From this we will be doing presentations on a different culture (PowerPoint) that will include all of the topics covered in the first 11 weeks.
第12回: Week 12 – Presentation of the student PowerPoint presentation.
第13回: Interview tests – Each student will have a 10-minute English interview covering topics covered in class.
第14回: Interview tests – Each student will have a 10-minute English interview covering topics covered in class.
